amendment.description: An amendment numbered 41 printed in Part B of House Report 118-216 to prohibit the use of funds to pay the salary and expenses of DHS Under Secretary for the Office of Strategy, Policy, and Plans Robert Silvers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 168 - 261 (Roll no. 448).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 168 - 261 (Roll no. 448).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
